column4: y guys my digital camera doesnt want to mount, what do i type in terminal?
hey guys, yall know how i can mount my digi cam
it should give you all your usb devices, camera should be among them
try unplugging it and plugging it back again
i recently got a new mobo, cpu and gfx card,the old mobo saw the camera
hey kane77: it now sees it
i dont know why it suddenly sees it
hmm... ubuntu wasnt able to detect a usb disk when I pluged into front socket, while the backward works... so it could be it (although now I got message it works so this text is basicaly useles :D)
